channel.title: VENTUS Beta Testing (Active Forums) (LOGIN AND PK) SOON TO BE NEW FEATURES!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466025/Ventus.gif[/img] Please note not a lot has been changed I am just going to keep the name as ventus. Since it wasn't out very long and people loved it. Plus it will bring back the old players who used to play ! :D plus the autocache is messed up need to fix it.
Please note you will need to put the cache in this folder in your c drive user.home https://www.dropbox.com/s/b5h0gbo0tt9fsyg/Client.rar
New member ranks on the forums please pick what you want there is over 20-30 of these bad boys :D http://uppit.com/55i4r1wicbu4/Forum_Images.rar This is all of them tell me which one you would like and I can add it to to forums and put you in that group so it shows up when you post!!
Many new features coming soon. I myself have released to many in the past month but then I realized I have been working with ECO servers for the past 2-3 years why not make a PK server. Ventus was my favourite source and always will be probably awesome new features are going to be coding in everyday.
I will be bringing updates daily. Forums and server sided. I have been told many times I am a dedicated owner and that's what got me 50-70+ active players on my old server.
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466033/Ventus1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466035/Ventus3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466038/Ventus4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466042/Ventus5.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466043/Ventus6.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3466045/Ventus7.png[/img]
More pictures will be posted soon just figuring out what kind of pictures I should post.
CREDITS:
Play Boy FrostBit3 Cizzle Reader Intrum Jason Iquality Kurt Kobain Demolition please note I don't get a large amount of the percentage right away. There is a lot that needs to be done BETA TEST FTW!
[SIZE=6]Ventus Forums www.diversityx.tk Please note this is old 2 weeks ago their the old forums 41 members in 2 weeks aint bad
Ventus forums = NEW www.diversityx.tk/smfBoss[/SIZE]
[CENTER][/CENTER][SIZE=4]Features
*Fully Working Bank Tabs *Bounty Hunter *Instant Pk'ing *VPS Hosted *PvP Drops *Amazing Combat *Dupe Free *New Text Engine *All PvP Armours *All Weapon Specials 100% *Flawless Switching *100% Ancient Curses *100% All Special Weapons *100% Uptime *Unique Clan Chat System[/SIZE]
Join the new forums now currently being updated www.diversityx.tk/smfBoss

item.title: VENTUS Beta Testing (Active Forums) (LOGIN AND PK) SOON TO BE NEW FEATURES!
item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

[quote=“ajmehta21, post:8, topic:526044”][quote author=dawsonsmokes link=topic=644788.msg4338209#msg4338209 date=1374724095]

Please note not a lot has been changed I am just going to keep the name as ventus. Since it wasn’t out very long and people loved it. Plus it will bring back the old players who used to play ! plus the autocache is messed up need to fix it.

Please note you will need to put the cache in this folder in your c drive user.home https://www.dropbox.com/s/b5h0gbo0tt9fsyg/Client.rar
NICE! a .com would hlep

Many new features coming soon. I myself have released to many in the past month but then I realized I have been working with ECO servers for the past 2-3 years why not make a PK server. Ventus was my favourite source and always will be probably awesome new features are going to be coding in everyday.

I will be bringing updates daily. Forums and server sided. I have been told many times I am a dedicated owner and that’s what got me 50-70+ active players on my old server.






More pictures will be posted soon just figuring out what kind of pictures I should post.

CREDITS:

Play Boy
FrostBit3
Cizzle
Reader
Intrum
Jason
Iquality
Kurt Kobain
Demolition please note I don’t get a large amount of the percentage right away. There is a lot that needs to be done BETA TEST FTW!

[SIZE=6]Ventus Forums www.diversityx.tk Please note this is old 2 weeks ago their the old forums 41 members in 2 weeks aint bad

Ventus forums = NEW www.diversityx.tk/smfBoss[/SIZE]

[CENTER][/CENTER][SIZE=4]Features

*Fully Working Bank Tabs
*Bounty Hunter
*Instant Pk’ing
*VPS Hosted
*PvP Drops
*Amazing Combat
*Dupe Free
*New Text Engine
*All PvP Armours
*All Weapon Specials 100%
*Flawless Switching
*100% Ancient Curses
*100% All Special Weapons
*100% Uptime
*Unique Clan Chat System[/SIZE]

Join the new forums now currently being updated www.diversityx.tk/smfBoss
[/quote][/quote]

Hey, when this server is done, make a new thread. I will be waiting

Looks nice.

item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:526044”][quote author=dawsonsmokes link=topic=644788.msg4338215#msg4338215 date=1374724258]
Upgraded from mybb back to SMF. Made the mistake with trying MyBB
[/quote]
There’s nothing wrong with using MyBB. You made the mistake of using a horrible theme with it.[/quote]

I can agree on that. I can also agree with I made a mistake with making unappealing forums. I fucked up they were made within 1-2 hours. The new SMF forums I am going to take my time on meaning I have 3 developers for this. Also everything is now hosted on www.diveristyx.tk/smfBoss
